summary: This module contains a comprehensive suite of unit tests that exercise AWS Systems Manager (SSM) operations using a mocked environment. The tests cover creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting parameters, handling version limits and labels, managing tags, invoking commands, and verifying pagination and error handling for various SSM API calls.
business_intent: Validate that the application correctly interacts with AWS SSM services, ensuring proper parameter management, tagging, command execution, and robust error handling under different scenarios.
